short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display current song lyrics for music platforms, such as Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, YouTube, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension for displaying current song lyrics.

It supports a lot of music platforms, such as Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, YouTube (with chapters), SoundCloud, etc.

You can check all platforms and other information on GitHub: https://github.com/AlexWayfer/song-lyrics?tab=readme-ov-file#song-lyrics

Right now it loads lyrics from Genius, other sources can be added in the future.

It also has options for displaying.

Changelog:

v5.1 (2024-06-26)

*   Watch for parsed search query change.
    You can resume watching by pressing "Refresh" button.
    Works with "Remove (Mix)" checkbox correctly.

*   Don't display "Remove (Mix)" checkbox when useless.

*   Pin correctly with a custom search query.

*   Fix parsing for YouTube.

*   Fix parsing for Shazam.

*   Fix border and background colors opacity for iframe popup.

*   Add "Clear iframe settings" context menu.
    When you've messed up with its position or size.

*   Increase lyrics cache TTL from 24 hours to 7 days.

v5.0 (2024-06-20)

*   Return regular popup, but add a pin button to display it as iframe.
    Now you will always open the default popup window, but you can switch to iframe anytime.

*   Add refresh button for re-parsing song title and artists from a site.

*   Remake iframe moving actions, adopt it for zoomed pages.

*   Remake CSS standard resize to a custom corner.

*   Fix song art sizes.

*   Allow song arts from AWS S3 (`/rapgenius`).

v4.0 (2024-06-05)

*   Make popup window as iframe.
    Resizable and movable.
    Position and size are saving per site.

*   Pass colors from popup iframe even when site is unsupported.

*   Add music platforms for popup iframe on non-supported sites.

*   Add query form for unsupported sites.

*   Add an error notice when site doesn't work as expected.
    With a link to contact the developer.

*   Remove trash in square parentheses from YouTube requests.

The whole changelog: https://github.com/AlexWayfer/song-lyrics/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md

Icon: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/song-lyrics_6887372
